title: 2 Simple Ways to Create a New Account on Facebook

steps.title: Open the Facebook app.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app. Tap the Facebook app icon, which resembles a dark-blue box with a white f on it. Facebook is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store .

steps.title: Tap Create new account.
steps.content: Tap Create new account . It's at the bottom of the screen. [1] X Research source If you're already logged into an account, tap â˜° , scroll down, and then tap Log out .

steps.title: Tap Get Started.
steps.content: Tap Get Started . This blue button is in the middle of the pop-up window.

steps.title: Enter your first and last name and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter your first and last name and tap Next . Both fields must be filled. You can always update your name later.

steps.title: Enter your date of birth.
steps.content: Enter your date of birth. Use the drop-down menu to select a Month, Day, and Year.

steps.title: Select a gender.
steps.content: Select a gender. You can select Female , Male , or More options for more selections.

steps.title: Tap Sign up with email address.
steps.content: Tap Sign up with email address . If you'd rather sign up with your phone number instead, enter it in the Mobile number field and tap Next .

steps.title: Enter your email address and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter your email address and tap Next . You'll need this email to confirm your account later.

steps.title: Enter a password and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter a password and tap Next . Make sure to use a secure password that can't be guessed easily . You can always change your password later.

steps.title: Tap Save to save your login information.
steps.content: Tap Save to save your login information. If you're using a device that isn't yours, or if you don't want to save your information, tap Not now instead.

steps.title: Tap I agree.
steps.content: Tap I agree . This is the blue button. If you're prompted for a verification code, open the email address that you used to create your Facebook account, look for the code in the subject line of the email from Facebook, and enter the code on the Facebook prompt.

steps.title: Go to https://www.facebook.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.facebook.com/ in a web browser. This will open your News Feed page if you're logged in. If you're already logged into an account, click your profile picture in the top-right corner, and then click Log out .

steps.title: Click Create new account.
steps.content: Click Create new account . This is the green button.

steps.title: Enter your first and last name.
steps.content: Enter your first and last name. Both fields must be filled out.

steps.title: Set your birthday.
steps.content: Set your birthday. Click the month drop-down box and select the month of your birth, then repeat this step for the day and year drop-down boxes.

steps.title: Select a gender.
steps.content: Select a gender. You can select Female , Male or Custom .

steps.title: Add your email address.
steps.content: Add your email address. Type a working email address to which you currently have access into the Mobile number or email field, then add the address to the Re-enter email field that appears below it.

steps.title: Enter a password.
steps.content: Enter a password. Type the password that you want to use into the "New password" text field.

steps.title: Click Sign Up.
steps.content: Click Sign Up . This is the green button.

steps.title: Verify your account.
steps.content: Verify your account. Go to the inbox for the email address that you used to sign up for Facebook and sign in if needed. Open the email from Facebook. In most cases, you'll just need to click a link to verify your account. You may be asked to provide a code instead.
